name: Slot Machine Wizard
description:
Slot Machine Wizard Game made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

You are wizard with an unhealthy obsession with gambling. After an unbelievable losing streak in the monster casino, you had to pay a fee. You didn't have the money, so the guards threw you into the dungeon. You can use your magic abilities to cast various spells, but there's a catch: because of your gambling addiction, what spells you will cast is out of your control! Will you be able to defeat the boss and leave the dungeon?

CONTROLS

WASD or Arrow Keys to move.

Space to Dash.

Mouse to aim.

Left Mouse Button to attack.

Right Mouse Button to cast a spell.

Q to skip spell.
